title: Master Audio Enhancement
description: Complete professional mastering chain with AI enhancement, vocal naturalizer, multiband compression, EQ, and LUFS normalization. Perfect for AI vocals.

title: Noise Removal
description: Professional noise reduction with two modes: Hiss-only (safe for music) or Full denoise.

title: Audio Upscale
description: Sample rate upscaling from 16kHz to 192kHz with frequency restoration.

title: LUFS Normalizer
description: Industry-standard loudness normalization (ITU-R BS.1770-4). Supports streaming, broadcast, and CD standards.

title: 3-Band EQ
description: Parametric 3-band equalizer (bass, mid, treble) with Â±12dB control.

title: Reverb
description: Algorithmic reverb effect with configurable room size and wet/dry mix.

title: Compressor
description: Dynamic range compression with configurable ratio, threshold, attack, and release.

title: Audio Mixer
description: Mix two audio streams with crossfade control.

title: Stem Separation
description: Extract vocals, drums, bass, and other stems using AI models (Demucs/Spleeter).

title: Stem Recombination
description: Recombine separated stems with individual volume control for each stem.
